content: While there's nothing you can do to resolve his dilemma (other than beat up Yellowbrow yourself), you can keep talking to him and he'll give you the **Trailblazer's Scarlet Gourd** , a new gourd bottle you can try that grants a full heal on the first swig!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
While there's nothing you can do to resolve his dilemma (other than beat up Yellowbrow yourself), you can keep talking to him and he'll give you the **Trailblazer's Scarlet Gourd** , a new gourd bottle you can try that grants a full heal on the first swig!
